messages.content:
take in a 64-character string and apply a transformation function that returns a new 64-character string. The new string must have the following characteristics: 1) each character should be different from its corresponding character in the source string; 2) any 9 should be changed to a 0; 3) all capital letters should be changed to lowercase letters; 4) all vowels should be changed to their acute accent form.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
